html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-13372024-12-16NA, ISC
ActTerritorial Lands Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Territorial Coal Regulations and the Territorial Land Use Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the TERRITORIAL COAL REGULATIONS and the TERRITORIAL LAND USE REGULATIONS (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to (1) update the definition of "Chief" from "the chief of the Resource Management Division of the Resource and Economic Development Group of the Department of Indian Affairs and Northern Development" to "the Director, Lands of the Nunavut Regional Office of the Department of Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs"; (2) update the definition of "Minister" from "Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development" to "Minister of Northern Affairs"; (3) replace obsolete language, specifically replacing the use of "Eskimos/esquimaux" (English/French) with "Inuit"; and (4) correct discrepancies between English and French.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0281 Publication Date: 2025-01-01
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the TERRITORIAL COAL REGULATIONS and the TERRITORIAL LAND USE REGULATIONS (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to (1) update the definition of "Chief" from "the chief of the Resource Management Division of the Resource and Economic Development Group of the Department of Indian Affairs and Northern Development" to "the Director, Lands of the Nunavut Regional Office of the Department of Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs"; (2) update the definition of "Minister" from "Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development" to "Minister of Northern Affairs"; (3) replace obsolete language, specifically replacing the use of "Eskimos/esquimaux" (English/French) with "Inuit"; and (4) correct discrepancies between English and French.
